system.requirements:
Tier 3; Strength 50, is an Ogryn 
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence
system.effect:
Once per Encounter, when this character inflicts Critical Damage on an enemy by dealing damage in excess of the enemy's Wounds, they can Spend a Fate Point to instantly kill them in a gruesome manner.
The Character gains Fear(2) against all foes who witness this until the end of the encounter.
